Class PromoCSVHelper

  • Object
    • CSVBaseHelper
      • PromoCSVHelper

  • public class PromoCSVHelper
extends CSVBaseHelper
    Helper class for CSV I/O of Promotions
    Since:
    2019-03-19
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Arthur Koh, Kenneth Soh

      Singleton instance of this class.
      private String promotionCsv
      Path to PromotionItem CSV File in the data folder.

    • Field Detail

      • promotionCsv

        private String promotionCsv
        Path to PromotionItem CSV File in the data folder. Defaults to promotion.csv.

      • pInstance

        private static PromoCSVHelper pInstance
        Singleton instance of this class. (used for "instanceof" which is better than creating a new object constantly.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PromoCSVHelper

        private PromoCSVHelper()
        Default Constructor to initialize this class with promotion.csv as the CSV file.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PromoCSVHelper getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance of PromotionCSVHelper that reads from promotion.csv. (if instance does not exist, declares a new instance) (else, just returns the existing instance)
        Returns:
        Instance of this class.

      • readFromCsv

        public ArrayList<PromotionItem> readFromCsv()
                                     throws IOException
        Reads the CSV file and parses it into an array list of Promotion item objects.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Promotion item Objects.
        Throws:
        IOException - Unable to read from file.

      • writeToCsv

        public void writeToCsv(ArrayList<PromotionItem> promotions)
                throws IOException
        Writes to the CSV File.
        Parameters:
        promotions - ArrayList of Promotion items to save.
        Throws:
        IOException - Unable to write to file.
